channel.title: RuneScape 2008 Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://falador.org/img/summonlogo.gif[/img][/center]
[URL=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Rune-Legacy/179233288793167][IMG]http://www.ericfaller.com/facebook_favicon.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Rune-Legacy/179233288793167]Follow us on Facebook[/URL] [URL=https://twitter.com/runelegacynews][IMG]https://twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img][/URL] [URL=https://twitter.com/runelegacynews]Follow us on Twitter[/URL]
[B]What is RuneScape 2008 Server?[/B]
RuneScape 2008 Server is a RuneScape Private Server, more based on an older version of RuneScape. This is [I]NOT [/I]an old school server, it is based on 2008. Why 2008? In 2008 Jagex was on their peak with [I]content[/I], and could still be considered a bit classic because of the old character models. They had some of the best content during this time, including Summoning, Construction, Hunter, Clan Wars, Bounty Hunter, God Wars (the actual GWD, not the custom minigames that RS2 Servers have created for themselves), more Holiday Events, Items, NPC's, Barbarian Assault, and the list goes on.
[I]I still don't know whether to make this server a remake, or an economy server. Please post suggestions, I would like to know what everyone wants.[/I]
Content, soon to be added:
[*]Clan Wars [*]Barbarian Assault [*]Burthorpe Games Room [*]Fishing Trawler [*]Duel Arena [*]Gnome Ball [*]Mage Training Arena [*]Barrows [*]Pest Control
Activities, soon to be added:
[*]Gnome Restaurant [*]Sorceress's Garden [*]Impetuous Impulse [*]Rat Pits [*]VineSweeper [*]Archery Competition [*]Rouge's Den [*]Castle Wars
[B]Distractions & Diversions[/B]
Treasure Trails
[B]Skills Progression: (Still updating)[/B]
[*]Firemaking [*]Thieving [*]Agility [*]Mining [*]Hunter [*]Fishing [*]Smithing [*]Fletching [*]RuneCrafting [*]Slayer [*]Cooking [*]Crafting [*]Farming [*]Herblore [*]Summoning [*]Construction
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/summoning.gif[/img][B]Summoning Progress[/B]
[*]Npc vs Npc - 60% [*]Npc vs Player - 0% [*]Pouch Creation - 75% [*]Scroll Creation - 75% [*]Pets - Hunger & Running away - 24% [*]Pets - Growing Up - 0% [*]Special Attacks - 15% [*]Summoning Tab - Correct Configurations for every single NPC - 50% [*]Combat Level -138 - 0% [*]Familiar Level Mask - 40% [*]Beast of Burden - 30% [*]Familiar Timers - 90% [*]Renewing - 0% [*]Npc Calling - 100% [*]Dismissing - 100%
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/waRGGJ.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/n6yutx.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2labvp0.png[/img]
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/items/r/rune_scimitar-1.png[/img] [b]Clan Wars progress[/b]
[*]Integrated with Clan Chat - 2% [*]Interface Values - 15% [*]Team Recruiting - 0% [*]Player vs Player - 0% [*]In-game Team - 0% [*]Object Masks - 0%
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/ciLkhm.png[/img]
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/o5zx5k.png[/img]
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/7EpttA.png[/img]

item.title: RuneScape 2008 Server
item.dc:creator: @xGenesis xGenesis
item.description:
@xGenesis wrote:

[center][/center]

Follow us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter

What is RuneScape 2008 Server?

RuneScape 2008 Server is a RuneScape Private Server, more based on an older version of RuneScape. This is NOT an old school server, it is based on 2008. Why 2008? In 2008 Jagex was on their peak with content, and could still be considered a bit classic because of the old character models. They had some of the best content during this time, including Summoning, Construction, Hunter, Clan Wars, Bounty Hunter, God Wars (the actual GWD, not the custom minigames that RS2 Servers have created for themselves), more Holiday Events, Items, NPC’s, Barbarian Assault, and the list goes on.

I still don’t know whether to make this server a remake, or an economy server. Please post suggestions, I would like to know what everyone wants.

[]Clan Wars
[]Barbarian Assault
[]Burthorpe Games Room
[]Fishing Trawler
